resources.string:
▪ Shivering or chills
 ▪ A new, continuous cough
 ▪ A loss or change to your sense of smell or taste
 ▪ Shortness of breath
 ▪ Feeling tired or exhausted
 ▪ An aching body
 ▪ A headache
 ▪ A sore throat
 ▪ A blocked or runny nose
 ▪ Loss of appetite
 ▪ Diarrhoea
 ▪ Feeling Sick oe being sick.
